duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide compassionate veterinary care to primary care surgery patients
Perform venipuncture, IV catheter placements, and laboratory/diagnostic duties
Assist in surgical preparation and anesthesia monitoring for soft tissue procedures and dentals
Maintain proper sterile conditions and dental radiographs
Manage patient records, complete estimates, and basic record keeping
Assist with postoperative care of the patient and pharmacy management
Provide discharge instructions to clients and work with all technical staff across the hospital

education_certification.credential: 2+ years experience as a Veterinary Technician or internship trained
Experience with soft tissue and dental procedures with canines and felines
